title: After upgrade the protocol to london and Arrowglacier on our "private chain" then i popup a error message when it reach defined milestone

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

body:
Hi @eu09, thanks for the report :)

We have an open issue which should fix this for you: https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/issues/2714
It is on our backlog so a fix is coming, although I can't give an exact timescale at this point.

In the meantime, you can configure IBFT to use an earlier milestone, e.g. `muirglacierblock` as shown here: https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/HowTo/Configure/Consensus-Protocols/IBFT/#genesis-file

PR contributions are also very welcome :)
